Posts.Content: May 22, 2008 07:48AM FLgaltg wrote: NO one has ever suggested this to me, but now that I am thinking back....had last dose of Taxotere in August, then Breast (not arm) lymphedema ever since.  I have wonderful therapist trained in the Vodder method of manual lymph drainage.  But has to be maintained by me at home.  Pain is not reduced, just fullness.
Posts.Title: Can Taxotere (or Taxol) trigger lymphedema? otter bomber410
